text: Edward Sanders (born August 17, 1939) is an American poet, singer, social activist, environmentalist, author, publisher and longtime member of the band the Fugs. He is a well known figure in the Beat and hippie generations. Sanders was very active in the beginning of the counterculture's creation. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American environmentalists Category:American civil rights activists Category:American political activists Category:American poets Category:Musicians from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Writers from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Singers from Kansas City, Missouri
title: Ed Sanders
